history.proof: intros Phi Hmax x. split. - intros H. unfold maximal, consistent in *. sfirstorder depth: 3. - intros H. sfirstorder use: maximal_consistent_derivable_closed unfold: derivable_closed.

exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language Gamma : Derivable L bSC : BasicSequentCalculus L Gamma Phi : context Hmax : maximal consistent Phi x : expr H : Phi x Unable to unify "maximal consistent Phi" with "Phi |-- x".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros Phi Hmax x. split. - intros H. apply Hmax. unfold maximal, consistent in *. split. + auto. + intros Psi Hcons Hinc. apply Hmax in Hcons. apply Hinc in Hcons. auto. - intros H. apply Hmax in H. unfold maximal, consistent in *. destruct H as [H1 H2]. apply H1.
